DOC.brief_summary: Patients Type 2 Diabetes randomly allocate intervention arm ( health coach + smartphone-based health promotion software ) significantly well Hemoglobin A1c level 6 month post-intervention patient Type 2 Diabetes allocate control arm ( health coach alone ) .
DOC.brief_title: Electronically Connected Health Coaching Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion : participate patient diagnose Type 2 Diabetes , 25 70 year age , regular primary care physician , HbA1c level > = 7.3 . Exclusion criterion : Axis I II psychiatric disorder . Primary outcome : HBA1c 6 month follow . Secondary outcome : Centre Epidemiological Studies Depression Scale
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes Fluency English and/or Spanish > 75 year age
